name: Clownen.EXE
description:
Your name is Wilbur, you're a clown who have been kidnapped! You awake in a mansion with weird creatures trying to stop you from leaving, collect all the keys and escape! Hopefully, you can get out and defeat those who had kidnapped you! Can you survive the epic boss level at the end?

WASD to move J to run and K to do everything else.
